entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet sln add` replaces space indentation with tabs #25707
  • With VS 16.9.22 installed, Warning MSB3101: Could not write state file "obj\Debug\net*\a.csprojAssemblyReference.cache". ... display when building 3.1/5.0 project in CLI. #25698

PullRequests

Created

  • Add --skip-sign-check option to repair, uninstall, and update #25699
    Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Implement functionality for templating workload and version constraints #25505
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch the last non-helix test over to running on helix. #25324
    Area-Infrastructure
